metaDescription: Premium 4-bedroom villa in prestigious Maryvilla, Calpe. €1,550,000. Sea views, luxury finishes, investment potential. Discover this exclusive Costa Blanca property.
heroIntro:
Welcome to an exceptional property in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious locations. This sophisticated 4-bedroom villa in Maryvilla, Calpe, represents a rare opportunity for discerning buyers seeking a premium Mediterranean lifestyle. Priced at €1,550,000, this exclusive residence offers remarkable value compared to regional benchmarks, particularly when considering the strong rental potential and appreciating market fundamentals. Calpe has experienced consistent 7% year-on-year appreciation, positioning this property as both an exceptional home and a sound investment.

The villa showcases the refined elegance that distinguishes luxury Costa Blanca living. With 6 bathrooms serving 4 generously proportioned bedrooms, every detail reflects high standards of construction and design. The commanding sea views provide a stunning daily reminder of your coveted coastal location, while the thoughtful layout ensures privacy and sophisticated entertaining.

This is more than a property purchase—it's an entry into an exclusive community where quality of life meets investment security. Whether as a primary residence, Mediterranean retreat, or rental investment, this villa delivers on every expectation of discerning international buyers.
areaSection: Calpe, positioned on the northern Costa Blanca, is distinguished by its dramatic geography dominated by the iconic Peñón d'Ifach rock formation. This natural landmark defines the town's character and provides a stunning visual backdrop. The location enjoys a Mediterranean climate with 300+ days of sunshine annually, temperate winters, and warm, dry summers ideal for year-round living. Nestled between Benidorm and Jávea, Calpe balances accessibility with exclusivity. The town has evolved from a modest fishing village into a refined coastal destination favored by European affluent buyers seeking authenticity without overdevelopment. The pristine coastline features multiple Blue Flag beaches, while the hinterland offers genuine Spanish culture, excellent dining, and a strong expatriate community that speaks multiple languages.
lifestyleSection: Living in Calpe represents a sophisticated Mediterranean lifestyle. The town attracts a discerning international community—particularly British and German residents—where English is widely spoken in commercial areas, yet authentic Spanish character remains. Daily life balances cosmopolitan convenience with authentic coastal charm. The Friday market bustles with local produce and artisan goods. World-class restaurants range from traditional Spanish taverns to contemporary cuisine. Private healthcare facilities with English-speaking staff ensure medical care meets international standards. The strong expatriate network provides social infrastructure without isolation from Spanish culture. Beaches are minutes away, while championship golf courses welcome visitors year-round. This is refined living—where Mediterranean sunshine, culinary excellence, healthcare quality, and cultural richness converge.
investmentSection: This property represents a compelling investment thesis. Calpe's real estate market has appreciated 7% year-on-year, outperforming broader Spanish coastal trends. At €1,550,000, this villa is positioned 20% below comparable Jávea properties while offering superior value characteristics. The rental market supports €1,000+ weekly rates for premium properties, generating substantial passive income—particularly during peak summer and winter seasons when Northern European demand peaks. International investors increasingly recognize Costa Blanca's stability, currency advantages, and lifestyle appeal. This villa's premium positioning, sea views, and bedroom configuration make it particularly attractive to luxury rental operators. The strong British and German expatriate community ensures consistent tenant demand. Combined with primary residence enjoyment, this property offers dual-purpose appeal: exceptional personal use with meaningful investment returns.
conclusion: This exceptional villa in prestigious Maryvilla represents a rare opportunity for discerning buyers seeking a premium Mediterranean property combining investment potential with lifestyle excellence. The combination of commanding sea views, sophisticated design, strategic location, and compelling valuation creates a compelling case for both primary residence and investment consideration. Calpe's consistent appreciation, established rental market, and balanced lifestyle appeal position this property at the intersection of personal enjoyment and financial prudence. The strong expatriate infrastructure ensures seamless integration while maintaining access to authentic Spanish culture. Whether seeking a Mediterranean retreat, lifestyle upgrade, or investment opportunity, this villa delivers on every expectation. Contact us via WhatsApp for private viewings, investment analysis, or to discuss how this property aligns with your Costa Blanca aspirations. Our multilingual team is prepared to guide you through every stage of acquisition.

healthcare.text: Healthcare in Calpe meets the highest international standards. Centro de Salud Calp provides primary care with multilingual staff, while numerous private clinics throughout town offer specialized services in English. Hospital de Dénia, located 30 minutes away, is a modern facility with comprehensive departments and English-speaking physicians. This healthcare infrastructure provides complete reassurance for international residents and their families. Private insurance options ensure access to premium facilities and consulting physicians at international standards. Emergency services are efficient and well-equipped. For residents prioritizing healthcare access, Calpe's combination of local facilities and regional hospitals provides exceptional peace of mind.

Benidorm (20 km) provides comprehensive shopping centers, boutiques, and department stores for extended retail exploration. The combination ensures both daily convenience and discovery opportunities. Local markets remain vibrant community gathering spaces where residents interact with local vendors and fellow expatriates.
